ipxact:component.ipxact:name: JPEG-DX-F

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ukn
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Unknown marker detected

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: unexp
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Unexpected marker detected

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: huff
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Huffman decode error detected

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: cerr
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: A component referenced in the scan header (SOS) was not defined in the previous frame header (SOF).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: qterr
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: A Quantisation table referenced in a component referenced in a scan (SOS header) selected an invalid Quantisation table.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: hterr
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: A Huffman table referenced in a scan (SOS header) is invalid.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: unkn_err_loc
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Unknown marker error location (write 0 to clear, write 1 keeps current value)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: unlok
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: In the event of an unknown marker error, the decoder stores the location of the unknown marker in this register. The location is the byte-offset from the last SOI marker processed.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: unex_err_loc
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: In the event of an unexpected marker error, the decoder stores the location of the unexpected marker in this register. The location is the byte-offset from the last SOI marker processed.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: uenlok
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: In the event of an unexpected marker error, the decoder stores the location of the unexpected marker in this register. The location is the byte-offset from the last SOI marker processed.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: hsym
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The Huffman symbol that is in error. The first bit of the Huffman symbol is on bit [15], the second on bit [14], etc.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: ecs_num_err
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: ECS number of Huffman symbol error

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: sloc
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: In the event of a Huffman decode error, the decoder stores the ECS number in which the error was found to this register. The ECS number is counted from the last SOI marker

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: huf_sym_err_loc
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Huffman symbol error location in ECS

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: soff
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: In the event of a Huffman decode error, the decoder stores the location of the invalid Huffman symbol in this register. The location is the bit-offset from the start of ECS. The ECS number in which the error was found is stored to the “ECS number of Huffman symbol error” (0x014) register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: aok
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: When this bit is set to 1, the tables (quantisation & Huffman) may be read or written. This bit is set to 1 if no frame is currently being processed – either the decoder has just been enabled and no frame was received or an EOI marker has been processed but the next SOI marker has not been received. While this bit is set to 1, no input data is processed.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: areq
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Table access request. If any of the quantisation or Huffman tables are to be accessed, this bit is to be set to 1 and the SW is to wait for bit [1] to be set before accessing the tables. To resume processing input frames, this bit is to be set to 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: rsvd

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EOB0M
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Contains the EOB symbol mask for Huffman table 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EOB0C
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Contains the EOB symbol for Huffman table 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EOB1C
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Contains the EOB symbol for Huffman table 1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EOB1M
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Contains the EOB symbol mask for Huffman table10.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EOB2C
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Contains the EOB symbol for Huffman table 2.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EOB2M
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Contains the EOB symbol mask for Huffman table 2.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EOB3C
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Contains the EOB symbol for Huffman table 3.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EOB3M
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Contains the EOB symbol mask for Huffman table 3.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: par_ibus_len
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Width of the input bus (defined by parameter) register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ibus_len
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Width of the input bus

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ppe
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of implemented pipes

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ri_max
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Maximum restart interval optimally support in multi-pipe implementation. The value given here is in “Number of 4 byte units”. If for example this register is set to 256, then the RSTm marker spacing in the input stream should be no more than 1024 bytes apart (256*4) to guarantee optimal operation. See also section 5.2 “Optimal use of multiple pipes”.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: qua_width
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Maximum quantisation table width supported register

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: par_qua_num
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of quantisation tables implemented register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: qua_num
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of quantisation tables implemented

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: par_huf_num
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of Huffman tables implemented register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: huf_num
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of Huffman tables implemented.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: dat_o_w
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Output data width.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: dat_o_type
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Gives the type of output samples the core generates on its output. The following values are valid: 0: The decoder generates unsigned output samples 1: The decoder generates signed output samples

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ram_dec
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This register gives the required tables to configure the Huffman decoder through the “Huffman table access” (0x080 & 0x084) registers as follows: 0: Huffman decoder can not be configured 1: Huffman decoder table, I and D vectors and the EOB symbol needs to be loaded. 2: Huffman decoder table, I and D vectors, Huffman decoder accelerator tables and the EOB symbol need to be loaded.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: acc_w
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This register gives the maximum length Huffman code which is decoded in a single cycle. All codes longer than the value in this register are decoded in two cycles.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: shift_w
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This register gives the maximum number of bits the Huffman decoder will process in a single cycle as 2SHIFT_W.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: hdata
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Accessing this register increments the Huffman table access address by one and decrements the “Huffman table access number of words remaining” (0x088). Reading from this register reads the Huffman table selected by the address register (0x080) and writing this register writes the selected Huffman table.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: huf_tab_acc_words_rem
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Huffman table access number of words remaining from the currently selected Huffman table

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: hwords
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This register gives the number of words that may be read from the currently selected Huffman table

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: IBUS_LEN
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Number of 8-bit bytes presented on the input in one cycle (4 or 8).

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: IBUF_NUM
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Input buffer size in words (IBUS_LEN bytes). Must be the exponent of 2 and at least 2.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: RI_MAX
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Largest restart interval optimally supported. Pipe buffer (before Huffman decoder) size in 4-byte units. Must be the exponent of 2 and at least 2.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: PBUF_NUM
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Pipe buffer (after Huffman decoder) size in number of Huffman symbols. Must be the exponent of 2 and at least 2.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: DAT_O_W
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Number of bits in each output sample (8-12).

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: DAT_O_TYPE
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Output sample type. 0 - unsigned output, 1 - signed output.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: HUF_TP_RAM
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Use two port RAM for Huffman table

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: ACC_TP_RAM
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Use two port RAM for Acceleration table

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: RAM_DEC
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Huffman decoder type: 0 - Decode only standard tables, 1 - Use external ram, 2 - Use external ram and acceleration table

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: ACC_W
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Huffman decoder first level symbol width.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: SHIFT_W
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Huffman decoder input data width (1-5). 2^SHIFT_W bits / cycle.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: BO_TUSER_W
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Block output interface user information width {UNUSED_PIPE,COMPONENT,ERR,RI,CMP_INTLV,SOF,EOS,SOS,EOB,SOB}

ipxact:component.ipxact:description:
STATUS: WORK IN PROGRESS
The JPEG Decoder core is a decoder core which takes as input any standards compliant JPEG stream and outputs raw image samples on its AXI-ST interface.
Features: Baseline JPEG (ISO/IEC 10918-1) Decoder - Single-frame jpeg images and Motion JPEG payload - Programmable Huffman Tables and Quantisation tables - Up to four colour components, and any image size up to 64k x 64k - All scan configurations and all JPEG formats - APP, COM, DNL and restart markers Interfaces - AXI Streaming I/O data interfaces - APB Control/Status interface Versions and Performance - One sample per cycle, area optimised - Eight samples per cycle performance optimized, able to process 4k/UHD even in low cost FPGAs Ease of Integration - No user programming required - Bit accurate software model, generates test vectors, expected results

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: IBUS_LEN
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Number of 8-bit bytes presented on the input in one cycle (4 or 8).

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: IBUF_NUM
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Input buffer size in words (IBUS_LEN bytes). Must be the exponent of 2 and at least 2.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: RI_MAX
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Largest restart interval optimally supported. Pipe buffer (before Huffman decoder) size in 4-byte units. Must be the exponent of 2 and at least 2.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: PBUF_NUM
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Pipe buffer (after Huffman decoder) size in number of Huffman symbols. Must be the exponent of 2 and at least 2.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: DAT_O_W
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Number of bits in each output sample (8-12).

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: DAT_O_TYPE
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Output sample type. 0 - unsigned output, 1 - signed output.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: HUF_TP_RAM
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Use two port RAM for Huffman table

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: ACC_TP_RAM
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Use two port RAM for Acceleration table

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: RAM_DEC
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Huffman decoder type: 0 - Decode only standard tables, 1 - Use external ram, 2 - Use external ram and acceleration table

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: ACC_W
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Huffman decoder first level symbol width.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: SHIFT_W
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Huffman decoder input data width (1-5). 2^SHIFT_W bits / cycle.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: BO_TUSER_W
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Block output interface user information width {UNUSED_PIPE,COMPONENT,ERR,RI,CMP_INTLV,SOF,EOS,SOS,EOB,SOB}
